Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review the agenda for the project kickoff meeting.
Finalize the presentation for the kickoff meeting, covering project goals, scope, team roles, schedule, and communication protocols.
Project Kickoff Meeting with the entire team. Present the project plan, answer questions, and ensure everyone is aligned.
Follow up with individual team members to address any specific concerns or questions arising from the kickoff meeting.
Update the project schedule in the project management software based on feedback from the kickoff meeting.
Review project management software tutorials and documentation to familiarize yourself with advanced features.
Configure project tracking features in the software, including progress indicators, notifications, and reporting options.
Identify potential project risks and bottlenecks. Develop mitigation strategies for each identified risk.
Review progress, update project schedule, and prepare a brief progress update for executive leadership.
